mapper.select: SELECT flag as pump_flag, recd_dt as pump_recd_dt, mark as pump_mark, opt_stat as pump_status FROM opt.optmz_cntr_pump order by recd_dt desc limit 1
SELECT flag as denipho_flag, recd_dt as denipho_recd_dt, mark as denipho_mark, opt_stat as denipho_status FROM opt.optmz_cntr_denipho order by recd_dt desc limit 1
SELECT flag as psbr_flag, recd_dt as psbr_recd_dt, mark as psbr_mark, opt_stat as psbr_status FROM opt.optmz_cntr_psbr order by recd_dt desc limit 1
SELECT flag as pac_flag, recd_dt as pac_recd_dt, mark as pac_mark, opt_stat as pac_status FROM opt.optmz_cntr_pac order by recd_dt desc limit 1
SELECT flag as mlss_flag, recd_dt as mlss_recd_dt, mark as mlss_mark, opt_stat as mlss_status FROM opt.optmz_cntr_mlss order by recd_dt desc limit 1
